data.actual_result: The message is not vertically aligned for languages that have String with multiple lines
data.expected_result: The ProTip message is vertically aligned, even if the String is longer than one line
data.short_description: The "ProTip" in the Pin Modal is not vertically aligned if the String is wrapped in multiple lines
data.steps_to_repro: - Set your language to German - Click on the Pin Button in a DM/Channel that you have no pins in - Observe
